Frontsize

CSS Component library for Frontsize

  • bem
  • block
  • modifier
  • element
  • variables
  • Configuration

This is the list of the vars used by Frontsize:

Var Default value Operates on Description
$bem-element __ bem.scss The BEM element convention prefix.
$bem-modifier -- bem.scss The BEM modifier convention prefix.
$frontsize-release-infos true info.scss Includes framework infos on CSS.
$invalidate-cache true background.scss Adds a different random string based on the SASS native function unique-id to the theme assets loaded.
$path-fonts / font.scss The default path for fonts.
$path-images / background.scss The default path for theme images.
$spacing 20px math.scss The value treated by frontsize’s s function.
$use-core-base false base.scss It generates a reset code that can be used instead of (or with) normalize library.
$use-core-print false base.scss Enables CSS default print media query behavior.
Configuration file

All’interno del file troverete la configurazione degli step simile a questa:

$use-core-base: true;
Frontsize component library

Frontsize is made with favorite by vitto @ ideato
